title: Мясная история Ли Зы
source:
[[include component:easy-gallery
|header=SCP-RU ArtWork-hub
|subheader=Мясная история Ли Зы
]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
.img1 {margin-right: 10px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top;}
.img1 p {margin-bottom: 5px}
.shield {background-color: #999999; width: 285px; outline: 1px solid black; padding-left: 5px; font-size: 13px; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 1px 2px #000;}
.header1 {background-color: #660000; line-height: 32px; font-size: 16px; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 1px 2px #000; text-align: center; margin-top: 50px;}
.header1:first-child {margin-top: 15px;}
[[/module]]

[[div class="header1"]]
++ **Рисунки**
[[/div]]

[[div class="img1"]]
[[div class="shield"]]
**Информатор (Участник арт-конкурса №2)**
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image the-eye-of-the-storm-interlude.jpg link="*https://files.scpfoundation.net/local--files/artwork:meat-story/the-eye-of-the-storm-interlude.jpg" style="width: 290px; outline: 1px solid black;"]]
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
#header {
    background: url(http://scpfoundation.net/local--files/artwork%3Arussian-art-hub/scp-art-hub.png) 15px 45px no-repeat;
    background-size: 90px;
}

#header h1 a::before {
    content: "SCP-RU ArtWork-hub";
    color: white;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px black;
}

#header h1 a span{
    display: block;
    content: "";
    visibility: hidden;
}

[[/module]]
